name: Gnome Before Dark
description:
GMTK 2018 Submission: Gnome Before Dark

"A racing game except you control the car parts instead of steering!"

Play the role of three gnome triplets who are racing to get home before Mama finds out that they stole the car for a ride! Use A and D to steer away from obstacles. Press the Spacebar in rhythm to accelerate. Swap out the headlight batteries with W and S when the lights get dim. Hurry home before the sun sets!
